additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Homosalate 8% w/w Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane 3% w/w Octocrylene 2.25% w/w Phenylbenzimidazole sulfonic acid 2% w/w PRESERVATIVES: Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: For external use on unbroken skin only. Use product as directed. May be irritant to eyes. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water. If eye or skin irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. Contains Benzyl Alcohol, phenoxyethanol and sodium benzoate.
